https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/Bs61nFmLEC7gTVbXwcwx3BRJUt.jpg Sidney is a 16 years old boy from the northern Brazilian coast who dreams to fly away from his provincial hometown. He sell birds on the Fortaleza beach where, one day, he meets a foreigner man who wants more from him than to just buy his birds. That can be Sidney chance to fly away. Acorda
